title: Let's have a shout-out to Riot's sound designers and sound engineers, the unsung heroes
body:
I find sound to be one of, if not the most important factor in my overall enjoyment of the champion.
So here's to you, unnamed people. You get no praise yet you keep on truckin'.

Some examples, feel free to add your own:
Vi's E triggering W, especially on the Neon Strike skin - i would do terrible things to the sound designer responsible for this beauty. Yes, that is an offer.
Maokai's whole kit and voice effects. Feels like a massive tree moving.
Sion's everything having amazing punch and impact.
Glacial ~~Maokai ~~Malphite E.
